snippet: A series of ink drawings of people buried at Hart Island, the city’s potter’s field, is on display at Westchester Community College, the latest body of work by Melinda Hunt.
abstract: Artist Melinda Hunt's series of ink drawings of people buried at Hart Island, potter’s field in Peekskill, NY, is on display at Westchester Community College (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: A series of ink drawings of people buried at Hart Island, the city’s potter’s field, is on display at Westchester Community College, the latest body of work by Melinda Hunt.
